name: Practically Perfect Dress
description:
A Sarah Seven original and a permanent style to the Sarah Seven bridal line.  The Practically Perfect dress is  pleated at bust to waist. Falls straight after, this dress is a bit fuller on the bottom.  It is a favorite among brides in the shop.
Belt is sold separately for $70. Fabric is silk chiffon available in white, off white and cream.

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip length from middle of bust to just above your knees.

Feel free to email me with questions. All strapless dresses take 4 months to make.  If you need it faster please let me know and I will see what I can do. 

We do have a few Practically Perfects in stock.  They take 2.5 weeks to ship.  If you send your measurements we can take them in for you if necessary.

name: Powdered Sugar
description:
A Sarah Seven original and permanent dress in the Sarah Seven bridal line the Powdered Sugar dress is made of off White sparkle organza pleated on a bodice. Pleats go from bust to waist. There are three bottom layers of the dress. The bottom of the dress has some volume. Very flirty dress! Beaded belt sold separately.

When ordering I will need your bra size, waist and hip measurement. ALong with height.

We do carry stock of the powdered sugar dress for immediate purchase.

name: Frenchie
description:
Hand Stitched silver backed rhinestones on gold double headband with gold backing.  Sarah Seven by Jade Rose.  Made in the USA.

In stock ships within 7 days,

name: Cherry Blossom
description:
Cherry Blossom is a Sarah Seven original from the "Mrs Black by Sarah Seven" Spring 2012 collection.
Dress is made out of red silk chiffon.  Vertical pleating on built in bustier which makes for great support.  Ruffles at bust.
Velvet at waist.
Cowls on both sides of bottom.  The cowls make the dress very flattering, you will be pleasantly surprised!

Dress is in stock and is not available for custom order at this time.

name: Amalie
description:
Hand stitched beads and rhinestones on hand cut lace.  Lace is set onto wire with combs.  Ivory Lace.  Sarah Seven by Jade Rose. Made in the USA.

Please allow 3 weeks for delivery.

name: Elope Dress
description:
A Sarah Seven original.  The Elope dress is made of polka dotted netting.  Dress is built off a bustier and is pleated at the bust to the waist.  There is volume at the bottom of the dress, the volume is created by the stiffness of the netting.

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip length from middle of bust to just above your knees.

Feel free to email me with questions. All strapless dresses take 4 months to make.  If you need it faster please let me know and I will see what I can do.

name: Flora Dress
description:
We have a sample that has been lightly worn in a size 10 that we are selling. Dress is color- Buttercream.  We can take it in if you would like it to be smaller we will charge $50 for this. Ships within 1 week.

This dress is built off of a bustier and is pleated at the bust to the waist. There is one strap that is covered in fabric flowers the flowers continue onto the dress and go down to the waist.  There are drapes on the bottom on each side.  

This dress looks super cute with one of our gold belts, sold separately for $70 and its removable! The dress is made out of silk chiffon and is available in white, off white or cream. 

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip length from middle of bust to just above your knees.

Feel free to email me with questions. All strapless dresses take 4 months to make.  If you need it faster please let me know and I will see what I can do.

name: With Love
description:
A Sarah Seven original.  Stunning bias cut sequin netting dress.  Cap sleeves, low back and small train make for a stunning gown.

Currently available for custom order

Takes 4 months

A Sarah Seven original and permanent dress in the Sarah Seven bridal line the Forget Me Not dress is- Pleating at bust to center with asymetrical cowl bottom.  Flower belt sold separately.  Built in bustier.  Please specify color- white, eggshell, cream. I can do other colors, please ask. 

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip and length from middle of bust to floor.

We do have some forget me not dresses in stock.  They take 2.5 weeks to ship.  If you send your measurements we can take a size in for you and mail it out.

name: Golden lights
description:
A Sarah Seven original and permanent dress in the Sarah Seven bridal line the Golden lights is My favorite dress from the collection.
Gold sequins netting pleated to middle of bust then down to waist.  Dress flows straight down giving some volume. 

Custom order takes 4 months to make.

name: Everthine Dress
description:
This dress is pleated vertically at the bust to the waist.  Then there are rows and rows and rows of bias cut ruffles.  The fabric is a crinkle silk chiffon. 

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip length from middle of bust to just above your knees.

Feel free to email me with questions. All strapless dresses take 4 months to make.  If you need it faster please let me know and I will see what I can do.

Ivory Lace top with bodice underneath makes for a very flattering top.  Paper bag waist pleated bottom with slight front cowl.  

Lace is available in ivory only.

name: Let me be your sweetheart dress
description:
A Sarah Seven original.  Dress is pleated at bust to waist.  At the waist there is a bow that is sewn on made of beads, the beads continue and form one strap over the shoulder opposite the bow.  Bottom flows straight down. Fabric is silk chiffon, it looks best in a shade of white when using the beads. 

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip length from middle of bust to just above your knees.

Feel free to email me with questions. All strapless dresses take 4 months to make.  If you need it faster please let me know and I will see what I can do.

name: Lasting love
description:
A Sarah Seven original.  Dress is pleated at top to waist.  Bottom has two panels and are trimmed so they have a "flutter" look to them.  

Dress is pictured in white.  Available in white and off white.  

We do carry stock of this item in white. If custom ordering item will take 4 months to produce.  Rush order is available $150 for 2 months.

name: Policies
description:
Sales-
All sales can be done on this bigcartel site or over the phone. For number please inquire.
All custom order sales are final. To make a custom order we need your measurements and payment. It currently takes 4 months to produce a custom order- production time does not begin until we have your payment and measurements. 
All stock items ship within 10 business days. If you are between sizes- we can alter any stock item this takes 4 weeks.  

We do reserve the right to refuse service to anyone. If this happens and payment has already been made you will receive a refund the same way you paid. 

We do not accept refunds on any custom items. We do take exchange on altered stock items. 

If you have any questions please just ask

description:
Peachy keen as seen in peoples style watch May issue pg 224

Silk chiffon georgette weight dress pleated on bustier vertically to waist with ruffles at top and peach velvet at waist.

name: To The Chapel
description:
Best dress ever!  Dress is pleated vertically with ruffles at bust, pleated down to your knees with ruffles popping out at bottom. Made out of crinkle silk chiffon available in white, off white and cream.

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip length from middle of bust to just above your knees.

Feel free to email me with questions. All strapless dresses take 4 months to make.  If you need it faster please let me know and I will see what I can do.

name: To The Chapel Gown
description:
This is my current version of a mermaid gown.  It is vertically pleated at bust to knees with rows and rows of ruffles at bottom.  There is a small train.  The ruffles are bias cut so no fraying will occur. Fabric is crinkle silk chiffon available in white, off white and cream.

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip length from middle of bust to just above your knees.

Feel free to email me with questions. All strapless dresses take 4 months to make.  If you need it faster please let me know and I will see what I can do.

name: White as Snow
description:
This dress is perfect for a wedding! It is so classic and romantic. The dress is built off a bustier The fabric is pleated and gathered on top. Please note belts are sold separately.  The bottom of the dress has 3 layers to it. The fabric is silk. 
I can make this dress in any color.
When ordering I will need the following measurements
bra size, waist, hip and length from middle of bust to just above the knee.
Please let me know if you have questions.

name: Delightful

My favorite dress! pleated at waist with one side cowl.  Flower belt sold separately.  
Can come in any colors.

When ordering I will need bra size, waist, hip and length from middle of bust to floor.
